      • success

        public void success()

      • failure

        public void failure()

      • getBookmarkId

        public String getBookmarkId()
        Get the last bookmarkId. It's only works when the underline transaction has been close. So you have to call failure() or success() before.
        Returns:
        the latest bookmarkId of this session.
